contents: “I switched it back to regular juice,” my dad says. “I found the fake gelatin juice in the refrigerator.” He’s grinning at me. All my pranks have been foiled! Then, he gets up from the table. “I’m late,” he says. “I’ve got to get going. No more pranks today!” He heads out the other door—only to be stopped in his tracks. There’s plastic wrap across the door. I finally got him! (25) _________________________
